entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Manicouagan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:26 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -25.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lac Manouane East 9:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -25.8°C
Humidity: 80 %
Dewpoint: -28.2°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing. High minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
